entries.npc_1_1: I can't be a mercenary any more. I have to quit... but I can't face my captain (we've been friends for so long). Would you deliver my resignation for me?
entries.npc_2_1: Thanks. I've got a unique Disruptor Particle Beam cannon that I won't need anymore. I'll give it to you when you return.
entries.npc_4_1: Blood for money. Money for blood. It all seems so stupid now.
entries.npc_reward_1: Thanks. Please take my disruptor particle beam cannon. It doesn't work - but the parts may be worth something.
entries.player_1_1: Yes. I will deliver your resignation.
entries.player_2_1: No. I have no time for this.
entries.player_3_1: Why do you want to quit?
entries.player_reset_1: I can't do this right now.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Well, come back when you're done.
entries.cantwork: Looks like you're too busy to help me. Come back when you're free.
entries.dontknowyou_1: I can't talk now -- I'm waiting for someone else.
entries.npc_work_1: Have you delivered my resignation yet?
entries.npc_smuggle_1: So... Kwin's resigning again? Fine. He'll be back.
entries.notyet: Sorry. The love of my life left me because I'm a mercenary... If there was some hope of her ever taking me back, I would leave this life and become a decent man.
entries.good: I can't believe it! She still loves me! I can't possibly continue in this line of work. I must go to her...
